title: Stocks in the news: Paytm, HCL Tech, Adani Power, Infosys and Adani Ports - Economic Times
content: Stocks in the news: Paytm, HCL Tech, Adani Power, Infosys and Adani Ports  Economic Times
description: State-owned REC on Tuesday said it will seek shareholders' nod through the postal ballot to appoint Parminder Chopra as Nominee Director of Power Finance Corporation and SKG Rahate as CMD.
